name: cite-trove
title: cite-trove
description: Adds a 'Cite Trove' context menu item on the Trove newspaper site, to allow for copying newspaper details into the clipboard.
author: Chris Willoughby

preferences.name: formatCitation
preferences.title: Citation Format
preferences.description:
Allows full configuration of the citation output.
	%A, %U or %u for persistent, full or shortened URL
	%C for current time
	%T for newspaper title
	%I for issue
	%P for page
	%Q for quote of selected text.
	%n for new line
All other text copied verbatim.
Original: %A%n%C%n%T%n%I, page %P%n[Quote]%n%Q%n[Quote]%n
